Articles.Content: I would like to be able to see the planets as little dots, just like stars, but only in night, because it looks very nice.
Well, you can actually do it, using unlimited zoom. e.g. telescope mods. The problem is that they don't shine, making them very dificult to spot.
You can see minmus and mun easily the other planets are visible as single pixels but easy to spot if you look closely I remember once spotting Jool and dressed in between Mun and minmus
